Articles.Content:
Since 1.2.1, the refocus key was apparently changed back backspace to backquote. Now I'm sure this is great for people with english, but for me using a danish layout, its gamebreaking since there isn't a backquote key on there. The only way for me to generate a backquote is to Shift + ´ and then hit enter. Needless to say this doesn't work in KSP.

Is there a way to customize this, because the using an English Layout while playing presents even more issues. Please help

EDIT: Nevermind, I just noticed an option to actually change hotkeys has been added at some point.

Edited June 5, 2017 by Sokar408
